General.Name: STC Concrete Product Public Company Limited
General.Description: STC Concrete Product Public Company Limited engages in manufacture and distribution of precast concrete products in Thailand and internationally. It offers ready-mixed concrete products, aggregates, concrete drains, precast concrete slabs, prestressed concrete piles, and finished fence panels, as well as moisture resistant concrete blocks under the STC CONCRETE name. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Pattaya, Thailand.
